channel.title: UX ideas from Notion
channel.description:
[Here](https://medium.com/swlh/how-to-use-notion-for-research-6003ed8cc07b) is a piece about using Notion in research.
I am particularly fascinated with the many ways in which the author is able to use gestures in that platform to accomplish so many tasks. I believe it can be a valuable exercise to imagine how some of that can be mapped into an open source OGM tool ecosystem.
